metadata.title: CVE-2024-26970 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  clk: qcom: gcc-ipq6018: fix terminating of frequency table arrays  The frequency table arrays are supposed to be terminated with an empty element. Add such entry to the end of the arrays where it is missing in order to avoid possible out-of-bound access when the table is traversed by functions like qcom_find_freq() or qcom_find_freq_floor().  Only compile tested.
